case.title: fancy an Pakistani guy with lots of money ? - 31 (london)
case.text:
Hello,
I am an indian based in london. I love travelling and meeting new people from different cultures. I am looking for someone fun and exciting ....would be great if you are in travelling then we can explore all the countries you have on your must visit list :) yeh nice hotel good food and good fun too...so please get back to me with your pics and lets get started ....
